de.tudarmstadt.ukp.similarity.algorithms.lexical.ngrams

Class WordNGramJaccardMeasure

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.tudarmstadt.ukp.similarity.algorithms.api.TermSimilarityMeasureBase
      • de.tudarmstadt.ukp.similarity.algorithms.api.TextSimilarityMeasureBase
        • de.tudarmstadt.ukp.similarity.algorithms.lexical.ngrams.WordNGramJaccardMeasure
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SimilarityMeasure, TermSimilarityMeasure, TextSimilarityMeasure
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    WordNGramContainmentMeasure

    public class WordNGramJaccardMeasure
extends TextSimilarityMeasureBase
    This comparator is an n-gram similarity model which employs the Jaccard similarity coefficient. It is the generalization of the Ferret measure (Lyon et al., 2004). While Ferret uses trigrams only, this measure allows to use any n-grams for comparison. C. Lyon, R. Barrett, and J. Malcolm. A theoretical basis to the automated detection of copying between texts, and its practical implementation in the ferrett plagiarism and collusion detector. In Plagiarism: Prevention, Practice and Policies Conference, 2004. (pdf)
